mapper.select: select ID as id, SKU as sku, NAME as name, CATEGORY as category, PRICE as price, LAST_UPDATED as lastUpdated from PRODUCT where id = #{id}
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE PRODUCT (ID INT PRIMARY KEY, SKU VARCHAR(50), NAME VARCHAR(100), CATEGORY VARCHAR(50), PRICE FLOAT, LAST_UPDATED DATE)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (ID, SKU, NAME, CATEGORY, PRICE, LAST_UPDATED) VALUES (#{id}, #{sku}, #{name}, #{category}, #{price}, #{lastUpdated})
